Package org.hkijena.jipipe.api.algorithm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JIPipeAlgorithmDeclaration
    Describes an JIPipeGraphNode
    JIPipeParallelizedAlgorithm
    Algorithm that supports parallelization
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultAlgorithmInputSlot
    Default implementation of AlgorithmInputSlot
    DefaultAlgorithmOutputSlot
    Default implementation of AlgorithmOutputSlot
    JIPipeAlgorithm
    An JIPipeGraphNode that contains a non-empty workload.
    JIPipeAlgorithm.StateSerializer
    Serializer used by getStateId() It automatically skips name, compartment, description, slot configuration, and UI parameters that are not relevant to the state
    JIPipeDataInterface
    Wraps a set of input and output slots that belong together This can be used for convenience
    JIPipeEmptyAlgorithmDeclaration
    An empty algorithm declaration.
    JIPipeEmptyAlgorithmDeclaration.Serializer
    Serializes the empty algorithm declaration
    JIPipeGraph
    Manages multiple JIPipeGraphNode instances as graph
    JIPipeGraph.Deserializer
    Deserializes an JIPipeGraph
    JIPipeGraph.Serializer
    Serializes an JIPipeGraph
    JIPipeGraphEdge
    A custom graph edge
    JIPipeGraphNode
    An algorithm is is a set of input and output data slots, and a run() function It is part of the JIPipeGraph.
    JIPipeGraphNode.Serializer
    Serializes an JIPipeGraphNode instance
    JIPipeIOSlotConfiguration
    Slot configuration that always ensures 1:1 relation between input and output slots
    JIPipeIteratingAlgorithm
    An JIPipeAlgorithm that iterates through each data row.
    JIPipeIteratingAlgorithm.DataBatchGenerationSettings
    Groups data batch generation settings
    JIPipeJavaAlgorithmDeclaration
    JIPipeAlgorithmDeclaration for an algorithm that is defined in Java code All necessary properties are extracted from class attributes
    JIPipeJavaAlgorithmDeclaration.Serializer
    Serializes the declaration
    JIPipeMergingAlgorithm
    An JIPipeAlgorithm that applies a similar algorithm to JIPipeIteratingAlgorithm, but does create JIPipeMergingDataBatch instead.
    JIPipeMergingAlgorithm.DataBatchGenerationSettings  
    JIPipeMergingDataBatch
    Wraps a set of input and output slots that belong together.
    JIPipeMutableAlgorithmDeclaration
    Instantiates JIPipeGraphNode instances
    JIPipeParameterSlotAlgorithm
    An JIPipeAlgorithm that has an optional slot that allows to supply parameter data sets.
    JIPipeParameterSlotAlgorithm.ParameterSlotAlgorithmSettings
    Groups parameter slot settings
    JIPipeSimpleIteratingAlgorithm
    An JIPipeAlgorithm that iterates through each data row.
    JIPipeUniqueDataBatch
    Structure that can hold multiple JIPipeAnnotation instances to make a set of traits a key
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JIPipeAlgorithmCategory
    Available algorithm categories
    JIPipeIteratingAlgorithm.ColumnMatching
    Strategies that determine how to detect the columns that should be used for matching
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AlgorithmInputSlot
    Annotates an JIPipeGraphNode with an input slot.
    AlgorithmInputSlots
    Required to allow multiple AlgorithmInputSlot
    AlgorithmOutputSlot
    Annotates an JIPipeGraphNode with an output slot.
    AlgorithmOutputSlots
    Required to allow multiple AlgorithmOutputSlot
